awards.name: The Summit Restaurant Award
awards.notes: Best for restaurant and F&B brands.
awards.description: The Summit Restaurant Award – fast food, fast casual, casual dining, fine dining, family style, buffet, cafés, bistros, diners, food trucks and pop-up restaurants.

awards.name: The Summit Nightlife Award
awards.notes: For nightlife, bars, clubs, late-night venues.
awards.description: The Summit Nightlife Award – nightclubs, bars, pubs, lounges, live music venues, comedy clubs, dance clubs, sports bars, rooftop bars, karaoke bars, adult entertainment venues, wine bars, speakeasies, cocktail lounges and dive bars.

awards.name: The Summit Attractions Award
awards.notes: Best for attractions, tours, entertainment experiences.
awards.description: The Summit Attractions Award – theatres, entertainment, museums, boat tours, natural, man-made, cultural, historical and novelty attractions, theme parks, zoos, aquariums, casinos, landmarks, parks, art galleries, festivals, sporting events and pop-ups.

awards.name: The Summit Hotel Award
awards.notes: For hotels, resorts and lodging brands.
awards.description: The Summit Hotel Award – hotel and lodging brands that want to support and be visible to the Chicago hospitality and tourism community.

awards.name: The Summit Concierge Award
awards.notes: For concierge & guest service oriented brands.
awards.description: The Summit Concierge Award – hotel, corporate and residential concierges and hotel guest services personnel.

awards.name: The Summit Planner Award
awards.notes: For corporate meeting and event planners.
awards.description: The Summit Planner Award – corporate meeting & event planners, wedding planners, birthday planners, association planners, fundraising planners, gala planners, family reunion planners and virtual event planners.

awards.name: The Summit Venue Award
awards.notes: For venues that host conferences and events.
awards.description: The Summit Venue Award – conference, convention and event venues, museums, clubs, concert venues, banquet halls, sports venues, stadiums, restaurant event spaces, parks and coworking spaces.

awards.name: The Summit Event Services Award
awards.notes: For AV, production and other event service providers.
awards.description: The Summit Event Services Award – AV companies, caterers, floral designers, rental companies, security services, transportation services, entertainment providers, staging and lighting companies.

awards.name: The Summit Destination Marketing Organizations & Associations Award
awards.notes: Best for DMOs, CVBs and hospitality associations.
awards.description: The Summit Destination Marketing Organizations & Associations Award – neighborhood associations, local, regional, national and international DMOs, trade associations, convention bureaus and tourism boards.

awards.name: The Summit Industry Distributors & Services Award
awards.notes: For distributors and B2B service providers in the industry.
awards.description: The Summit Industry Distributors & Services Award – beverage, janitorial, equipment, wholesale and specialty item distributors, promotional item and linen suppliers, technology and software providers.

awards.name: The Summit Social Media Influencers & Creators Award
awards.notes: Open to any business that leans on influencers and creators.
awards.description: The Summit Social Media Influencers & Creators Award – bloggers, vloggers, streamers, podcasters, visual artists, influencers, photographers and other content creators.

awards.name: The Summit Shopping Award
awards.notes: For malls, retail brands and shopping destinations.
awards.description: The Summit Shopping Award – malls, shops, retail pop-ups, souvenir shops, farmers markets, cultural shops, specialty food shops, outlet malls and boutique stores.
